title: Twitter’s Response to Kylie Jenner and Tyga Hanging Out Again Is Extremely LOL
text:
From Cosmopolitan

Kylie Jenner and Tyga hung out together amid news of her split from Travis Scott, and Twitter cannot deal.

Peep the best tweets and memes about Tyga ~presumably~ hopping into Kylie’s DMs below! Life is wild!

Kylie Jenner’s life is extremely dramatic at the moment (I mean, I guess it always is) thanks to news of her breakup with Travis Scott taking over the internet. But more important, Kylie was apparently seen visiting her ex-boyfriend Tyga’s recording studio late Tuesday night, which has basically caused the entire internet to spiral.

Photo credit: James Devaney - Getty Images More

2019 has been a truly wild year (please see: our current political situation), but news of Kylie reuniting with her ex might just be what breaks us. And the reaction on Twitter is equal parts hilarious and “IS THIS REAL LIFE HOW IS THIS EVEN HAPPENING.” Mostly because Tyga and Kylie had a notoriously messy relationship and breakup—like, remember when he took credit for her Lip Kits? Yeah.

Anyway, here’s a sampling of people on Twitter doing the most to either brighten or ruin your day!

3 years ago Tyga said this. 💀 pic.twitter.com/wJJtArqmNY — Benjamin Enfield (@BenjaminEnfield) October 3, 2019

Tyga after hearing about Kylie Jenner and Travis Scott breaking up

pic.twitter.com/JOqcrTc9Hr — NC 👑🎃 (@NewCuIture) October 3, 2019

Kylie when Travis confronts her reunion with Tyga 😂 #KylieJenner pic.twitter.com/RQpRRGsiAh — Mint Phresh (@mint_phresh) October 3, 2019

Kris Jenner calling TMZ after tracking Kylie's car to Tyga's house pic.twitter.com/m7JrbYRDYa — Hanna Dickinson (@hansdickie) October 3, 2019

Travis : it’ll be aight

News: Kylie meets up with tyga in studio

Travis: pic.twitter.com/c4qj1YxqDe — nattee (@x7nathaniel) October 3, 2019

Me: why is tyga trending ? 🤔

*clicks on name*

Also me: pic.twitter.com/AHFniigFAa — Marisol🕊 (@fromtheyay) October 3, 2019

Tyga with the biggest comeback of 2019 😂😂😂 pic.twitter.com/oHCfZ6AXNO — حکمت (@__Hikmat) October 2, 2019

Tyga when he heard that Kylie Jenner and Travis Scott broke up pic.twitter.com/ycbhBAZlPq — K. (@katjovicc) October 2, 2019

Tyga when he heard that Kylie Jenner and Travis Scott broke up pic.twitter.com/dgvidj2EFz — IG: Kloutgoated (@kloutgoated) October 2, 2019

As a reminder, E! reported that Kylie and Tyga met up late Tuesday night while she was chilling with friends. “Kylie wanted to have a girls’ night out last night and Stassie thought it would be best to get her out of the house and her mind off the news,” a source said. “He was with a few of their mutual friends at Sunset Marquis and invited Kylie and her girlfriends to come hang out, since they were already out.”

Sounds extremely sus, but the source claimed “it wasn’t an intentional jab at Travis, but she did hang out with Tyga for a bit. Nothing romantic is going on.”
